description: Erection of a single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [2043/10A (Rev 3)- Received 07/12/2023; 2043/1, Location Plan (unnumbered), Fire safety strategy - Received 12/10/2023].

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the side elevation of the development hereby permitted.
Condition : 5 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed on the building hereby permitted without the prior written approval of the local planning authority.

Condition : 6 - The car parking accommodation  shown on the approved drawing(s) shall be provided before the development to which it relates is first brought into use and thereafter it shall not be used for any purpose other than the parking of vehicles associated with the ground floor unit and shall be permanently retained.
Condition : 8 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be used for purposes other than those ancillary to the use of the business unit fronting Bath Road.
